name: Underpowered Jam Edition
description:
Made for the Chaos Game Jam #1 in under 48 hours. 

All assets except for the font and some lines of code were created by me entirely within the limit, including music.

This game has controller support.

The theme was "Pay to Win," so you can buy extra health or super useful ammo.

KNOWN BUGS: You can get stuck on the floor - Enemies don't track you properly - The springs in level 2 stop bouncing if the first one is shot

The browser version doesn't load, so it has been removed
